personblurb.para: This is just a sample; it validates against the DTD, but I’m not claiming any more than that.

abstract.para: This is the abstract for an example article. Given that the article is about nothing, so is the abstract.

article.para: This is just a sample XML document written to conform to the DocBook 5.1 Schema. Beyond conforming to the schema, it’s really got nothing to offer.
